amendment.description: An amendment numbered 35 printed in House Report 118-142 to prohibit the Department of Defense Education Activity schools from purchasing and having pornographic and radical gender ideology books in their libraries.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the Department of Defense Education Activity schools from purchasing and having pornographic and radical gender ideology books in their libraries.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A022) Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 209 (Roll no. 314).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A022) offered by Mrs. Boebert.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A022) Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 209 (Roll no. 314).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
